library.name: Blocks Library

numberSpecies.message: You need only 2 species in this activity

breed.setupCode: setxy random-xcor random-ycor set size 1.5 set color random color
breed.updateCode: set age age + 1 set energy energy - 0.5 if energy < 0 [if any? out-link-neighbors [ask out-link-neighbors [die]] die]
set age age + 1 set energy energy - .5

trait.name: vision
trait.visualizeProcedure: let this-xcor xcor let this-ycor ycor let this-vision vision let this-heading heading hatch 1 [ set breed sense-cones set size this-vision set shape "vision cone" create-link-from myself [tie] ]

library.go: if not any? turtles [ user-message (word "There are no more turtles!") stop ]

condition.name: any-here?
condition.test: report any? other turtles-here with [ breed = breed-type ]

condition.name: any-in-sight?
condition.test: report any? other turtles in-cone vision1 120 with [breed = breed-type ]

behavior.name: flee

agentInput.name: predator
agentInput.tooltip: Who do they run away from?

behavior.commands: ifelse any? out-link-neighbors [ if any? predator in-cone vision 120 [set heading heading + 180]] [if any? predator in-radius .5 [set heading heading + 180]]

behavior.name: eat
behavior.commands: ifelse is-agentset? prey1 [ if any? other turtles-here with [breed = prey1] [ let food one-of turtles-here with [breed = prey1] ask food [die] set energy energy + 2 ] ] [ if prey1 != nobody and not empty? prey1 [ let food turtle item 0 prey1 face food fd .5 if distance food < 1 [ ask food [die] set energy energy + 2 ] ] ]

behavior.name: eat-w-dist

behaviorInput.name: vision-range
behaviorInput.tooltip: At what distance can they see?

behavior.commands: ifelse any? turtles-here with [breed = prey] [ let food one-of turtles-here with [breed = prey] ask food [if any? out-link-neighbors [ask out-link-neighbors [die]] die] set energy energy + 5] [let target one-of other prey in-radius vision-range with-min [distance myself] if target != nobody [face target fd vision / 4] ]

behavior.name: have-babies
behavior.commands: ask breedname with-max [energy] [ ;set energy (energy / 2) ifelse count out-link-neighbors > 0 [ hatch 1 [set age 0 rt random 180 fd 2 mutate set-sense-cone1]] [hatch 1 [set age 0 rt random 180 fd 2 mutate]]

quantity.name: number-of
quantity.reporter: report count turtles with [ breed = breed-type ]

trial
quantity.reporter: report count turtles with [ breed = breed-type ]
